content.question: The low birth and death rates for a country in stage 4 of the demographic transition model are best explained by

choices.label: the rural population and agricultural livelihood of a less developed country.
the level of education and traditional roles for women in a less developed country
the resource-based economy and life expectancy of a less developed country
the level of urbanization and technological advancement of a more developed country
the environmental pollution and manufacturing infrastructure of a more developed country

content.answer: the level of urbanization and technological advancement of a more developed country

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data to draw conclusions.
